name: npm-build-project
description: A set of common build tasks written with npm scripts.

scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/main.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/main.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
